userStories.story: As a user, I want to log in using my user ID and password so that I can access the application features.
userStories.trigger: Enter user ID and password, then press Login key/button
userStories.expectedBehavior: System validates credentials and grants access if correct, else displays Invalid user or password message.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to view my main dashboard upon successful login so that I can see my options clearly.
userStories.expectedBehavior: System loads the dashboard with user-specific menu options.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to log out from my account so that I can secure my session.
userStories.expectedBehavior: System terminates session and returns to login screen.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to be notified if caps lock is on when entering my password, so that I can avoid login errors.
userStories.expectedBehavior: Displays warning if caps lock is active.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to be shown an error message if I submit the login form with empty fields so that I know what is missing.
userStories.trigger: Submit login form with missing data
